Quest.QuestDescription: The Queens crown has been stolen by a bandit

Task.TaskText: The Queen can be found roaming around the castle

Conversation.Dialogue: Queen: Oh No!! Can you help, my crown has been stolen
{CHARACTER_NAME}: I can, where did you last see it?
Queen: A Dragon flew into the castle and took it straight off my head. My son reported seeing it land amongst the woods in the grassland.
{CHARACTER_NAME}: Ok I will go and speak with the Prince.

Task.TaskText: The prince can be found roaming around the castle

Conversation.Dialogue: {CHARACTER_NAME}: Hello Sir, your mother said that you had seen where the dragon had landed.
Prince: I did, I followed it to the woods outside the castle towards the north-east. When I saw how many there were I had to flee.
{CHARACTER_NAME}: No problem I will find them and return the stolen crown.

Task.TaskTitle: retrieve the crown from the woods and return it to the queen

Conversation.Dialogue: Queen: My crown !! Thanks you ever so much
{CHARACTER_NAME}: Next time try and keep it firmly on your head when a dragon flys by.
